issue.title: Difference in scoring for different Docks

content.raw:
# Temporary Resolution

At the current time, a few hours before the final VRX due date, we are not going to make a change to address the placard offsets. We understand that there’s a bit of inconsistency while docking but we don’t want to risk disturbing other solutions that might be considering the current behavior.

We will leave the issue open \(unresolved\) so that it continues to be tracked. After phase 3 we will merge the fix when there is less risk and appropriate time for testing.

Thank you all for working on this last minute issue.
content.html:
Temporary Resolution

At the current time, a few hours before the final VRX due date, we are not going to make a change to address the placard offsets. We understand that there’s a bit of inconsistency while docking but we don’t want to risk disturbing other solutions that might be considering the current behavior.

We will leave the issue open (unresolved) so that it continues to be tracked. After phase 3 we will merge the fix when there is less risk and appropriate time for testing.

Thank you all for working on this last minute issue.
